name: Ward7
description:
Ward7 is a game-like interactive storytelling experience centered around disability and magic.  You wake in a sleepy Wisconsin hospital where the residents of the rare diseases ward hold the secrets to uncovering your identity and the larger supernatural forces which plague the unit.

Ward7 was made by Dani Emrich and Calvin Logan as part of our Capstone in CTD. This is currently a demo of our game, we will continue development through the summer to make it align more with our final vision.

Made using Unity and Inky
